tooltip.castle_in_the_sky.levitation_sto: This stone leads you to *Castle in the Sky*.
Trade with a cartographer for the item.
tooltip.castle_in_the_sky.keys: Obtained by looting chests or killing mobs in the castle.
tooltip.castle_in_the_sky.laputa_miniatu: Obtained by using the destruction incantation in the castle.
advancements.castle_in_the_sky.trade.tit: There is a Castle on a Cloud
advancements.castle_in_the_sky.trade.des: Legend says that a mysterious stone leads you to a castle full of treasure.
advancements.castle_in_the_sky.get_levit: Get a levitation stone by trading with a Cartographer.
advancements.castle_in_the_sky.find_cast: Find *Castle in the Sky* by following the levitation stone.
advancements.castle_in_the_sky.conquer_c: Travel through the castle dungeon and find the levitation crystal.
advancements.castle_in_the_sky.fake_beac: Loot a beacon light in the castle.
advancements.castle_in_the_sky.destroy_c: Destroy the castle by casting the destruction spell and obtain the trophy.
info.castle_in_the_sky.sacred_castle_eff: You need to conquer the castle first.
You need to conquer the castle first.
info.castle_in_the_sky.locked_doors: Unlocked by keys with corresponding color. Kill mobs or loot chests to obtain them.
info.castle_in_the_sky.destruction_warni: You are saying the destruction incantation. Say it again to confirm.
info.castle_in_the_sky.crystal_not_found: Nothing happened... You need to stand nearby a de-activated crystal.
info.castle_in_the_sky.item_not_hold: Nothing happened... Make sure you are holding a levitation stone.
info.castle_in_the_sky.destruction_disab: Destruction incantation is disabled in the server
info.castle_in_the_sky.too_close_to_spaw: No castle spawns within %d blocks near spawn. You must go at least %d blocks to use this stone.
